rules: There are 30 questions divided equally into 1 run 2 runs 3 runs 4 runs and 6 runs. The difficulty of the question is directly proportional to the runs assigned to them.
Contestant will select the runs. If they answer it right they score the runs if they get it wrong they lose a wicket
Lose 5 wickets and you will be eliminated from the game.
The goal is to score maximum runs while losing least wickets possible.
In case contestant want to leave the quiz in middle contestant can declare.
